import { TextField } from "@material-ui/core" import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import abacus1 from "../assests/abacus1.jpg" import abacus2 from "../assests/abacus2.jpg" import abacus3 from "../assests/abacus3.jpg" import { useState } from "react" import "../styles/Viewacademy.css" import Enrolledcourse from "../EnrolledCourse/Enrolledcourse"; export default function Viewacademy(){ const academy = [ {img:abacus1, acad:"Abacus Academy", place:"Channai", rating:"4"}, {img:abacus2, acad:"Abacus Center", place:"Bangalore", rating:"3"}, {img:abacus3, acad:"Abc Academy", place:"Coimbatore", rating:"4.5"} ] const [tabs, setTabs] = useState("academy") const tabSwitch =(name) => { setTabs(name) } return(
Abacus Academy
tabSwitch("academy")} className="tabs" style={{border:'1px solid gray', borderRadius:'4px', padding:'8px 15px', marginLeft:'20px',cursor:"pointer"}}>Academy tabSwitch("course")} style={{border:'1px solid gray', borderRadius:'4px', padding:'8px 15px', marginLeft:'20px', cursor:'pointer'}}>Enrolled Course
Log Out
{tabs==='academy'?(
{academy.map((aca) => { return
{aca.acad}

})}

) }
